metas.name: Demon Slayer: Kimetsu no Yaiba Infinity Castle
metas.description:
Genres: Action, Adventure, Drama, Supernatural Tags:War/Demons/Male Protagonist/Swordplay/Revenge/Dungeon/Shounen/Super Power/Curses The All-Out War Begins.

Theatrical trilogy adaptation of the Infinity Castle Arc.

metas.name: Chainsaw Man – The Movie: Reze Arc
metas.description:
Genres: Action, Drama, Supernatural Tags:Demons/Monster Boy/Male Protagonist/Urban Fantasy/Gore/Body Horror/Urban/Anti-Hero/Shounen/Heterosexual/Henshin Theatrical follow-up to Chainsaw Man.

Denji became “Chainsaw Man”, a boy with a devil’s heart, and is now part of Special Division 4’s devil hunters. After a date with Makima, the woman of his dreams, Denji takes shelter from the rain. There he meets Reze, a girl who works in a café.

(Source: MAPPA CHANNEL)

metas.name: 100 METERS
metas.description:
Genres: Drama, Sports Tags:Rotoscoping/Athletics/Coming of Age/Outdoor Activities/Fitness/Male Protagonist/Shounen 100 METERS follows Togashi, a track star who is born to run. As a kid, he is naturally gifted and wins every 100-meter race without effort. But in sixth grade, he meets Komiya, a transfer student who is full of determination but lacks technique. In teaching him, Togashi gives Komiya a new purpose: to win no matter what. Years pass by, and Togashi and Komiya meet again as rivals on the track and reveal their true selves.

(Source: GKIDS)

metas.name: Fushigi ‌no ‌Kuni ‌de ‌Alice to: Dive ‌in ‌Wonderland
metas.description:
Genres: Fantasy Tags:Female Protagonist/Fairy Tale/Isekai I'm supposed to be reading the air so I don't screw up,
I'm doing what everyone else is doing,
Why can't I get things done?

Rise Azumino, a university student, was lost in her life,
One day, guided by an invitation letter left behind by her late grandmother, she enters “Wonderland".
There she meets a girl named Alice and they begin their journey together.

Rise meets the White Rabbit, the Caterpillar, the Queen of Hearts, the Trumpeter, the Mad Hatter and the March Hare, Humpty Dumpty, the twins Tweedle Dum and Tweedle Dee, the Cheshire Cat and ......
The residents of Wonderland appear one after another in front of Rise!
And the crazy commotion that ensues!
What kind of future will Rise choose in this crazy adventure with Alice?

This adventure will surely bring a smile to your face tomorrow!

(Source: Official Site, Translated)

metas.name: ChaO
metas.description:
Genres: Fantasy, Romance Tags:Mermaid In a futuristic world where humans and mermaids coexist, ChaO follows Stephan, a mild-mannered office worker at a shipbuilding company, whose life is upended when he is suddenly proposed to by Chao — a princess from the mermaid kingdom. With no time to make sense of what’s happening, Stephan soon finds himself living with the unpredictable, wholehearted Chao. As her sincere love begins to break down his emotional barriers, an unexpected and touching romance begins to unfold.

(Source: GKIDS)

metas.name: Tooi-san wa Seishun Shitai! "Baka to SmaPho to Romance to"
metas.description:
Genres: Comedy Tags: Tooi, an ordinary high school girl, was expecting a normal school life—until everything changed on her very first day.

After catching the attention of the unpredictable and overly energetic classmate Jel, she's suddenly roped into the mysterious "Youth Romance Club," a bizarre school group dedicated to chasing down anything that feels "youthful" or "romantic."

What should've been a carefree club quickly spirals into chaotic antics, with Tooi constantly playing the straight man to everyone's nonsense. To make things even wilder, the club's antics start getting streamed online!

Between laughter, unexpected twists, and even a mysterious incident, this unpredictable school life is just getting started.

metas.name: AS ONE
metas.description:
Genres: Mecha, Sci-Fi Tags:Full CGI Square Enix’s sci-fi arcade game Starwing Paradox is making a comeback as a prequel anime movie. A new anime feature film titled AS ONE has been announced as a prequel story set 20 years before the events of the game, expanding the game’s universe with a new story. The movie is set to premiere in Summer 2025.

(Source: Anime Corner)

metas.name: Odekake Kozame: Tokai no Otomodachi
metas.description:
Genres: Slice of Life Tags:Anthropomorphism/Iyashikei/Animals/Urban/War Kozame-chan's everyday life is full of fun and excitement! This time, the next destination is the big city. What awaits Kozame-chan is an unfamiliar place, and new friends. A big adventure filed with tiny miracles is about to begin.

(Source: Youtube)

Note: The film receives an early premiere at the Tokyo International Shark Film Festival on August 3, 2025.

metas.name: Crayon Shin-chan: Chou Karei! Shakunetsu no Kasukabe Dancers
metas.description:
Genres: Comedy, Ecchi, Slice of Life
Tags:
null

metas.name: KING OF PRISM -Your Endless Call- Minna Kirameke! Prism☆Tours
metas.description:
Genres: Music, Sports Tags:Idol/CGI/Primarily Male Cast/Ice Skating This time King of Prism is "Prism☆Tours"! Shin Ichijou and the other six members of SePTENTRION will travel across time and worlds in a time machine to the origins of Prism Shows.

It will cross the boundaries of the series and intertwine with the worlds of the "Pretty Rhythm" series, "PriPara" series , "Kiratto Pri☆Chan", and "Waccha PriMagi!" to deliver a sparkling Prism☆Tours.

Fated boy meets boy, our worlds are now connected by the prism's sparkle!

(Source: Official Website, translated)

metas.name: Soreike! Anpanman: Chapon no Hero!
metas.description:
Genres: Comedy, Fantasy Tags: The film centers on Chapon, a mysterious boy who falls from the sky without any knowledge of where he came from. Staying with Anpanman, he one day helps someone out and gets to know the joy of making someone smile, and dreams of becoming a hero like Anpanman. But when Baikinman arrives, and reveals the secret of Chapon's origins, Chapon must figure out if his origins or his dreams define who he is.

(Source: Anime News Network)
